main_definition: A wager or a confident prediction about an outcome, often involving money.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To place a bet on the outcome of something
meanings_and_examples.example: I'll bet $20 that it will rain tomorrow.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A prediction made with confidence or certainty
meanings_and_examples.example: She always bets her brother won't eat all the cookies before dinner.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An expression used to convey a strong belief in something
meanings_and_examples.example: I bet you didn't see that coming!

meanings_and_examples.definition: A risk taken on the outcome of an event, often involving money
meanings_and_examples.example: He took a big bet and lost all his savings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An expression used to show conviction about something being true or happening
meanings_and_examples.example: I bet my bottom dollar that we'll win the game!
